page.title: 11WISBOROUGH GREEN CHURCH
page.content: St. Peter ad Vincula is in the diocese of Chichester, the deanery of Petworth and the see of Canterbury. Services are said daily. On Sundays there are two services. Holy Communion at 8.30a.m. and another at 10.30a.m. which may be Holy Communion or a Family Service. The present vicar is the Rev. Francis Dare. The bells are rung on Sundays before the 10.30a.m. service and the singing is accompanied by an organ. Weddings and funerals are also held at the church. A Sunday school which teaches religious knowledge is held on Sundays. There are two groups: the Chain or the Cornerstone according to the age of the children.
